title: Stock Futures Creep Down Ahead of Earnings, Manufacturing Data
sub_head: Investors await results from companies including Google parent Alphabet and Exxon Mobil
body:
U.S. stock futures and Treasury yields edged lower, as investors awaited manufacturing data and earnings from big-name companies including Exxon Mobil and Alphabet.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 inched down 0.4% Tuesday, a day after the broad index rallied for a second consecutive day. Blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average futures and futures for the technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 edged 0.3% lower.
